user = User.new({username: "johndoe1", full_name: "John1 Doe1", location: nil, biography: nil, receives_mailed_notifications: true, receives_digest: true, }); user.created_at = Time.parse("1970-01-01T00:00:00Z"); user.updated_at = Time.parse("1970-01-01T00:16:40Z"); user.deleted = false; user.admin = false; user.email = "johndoe1@example.com"; user.registration_code = nil; user.reset_password_token = nil; user.reset_password_sent_at = nil; user.remember_created_at = nil; user.sign_in_count = nil; user.current_sign_in_at = nil; user.last_sign_in_at = nil; user.current_sign_in_ip = nil; user.last_sign_in_ip = nil; user.password = "some_dummy"; user.encrypted_password = "123hoi"; user.skip_confirmation_notification!; user.save!; user.confirmed_at = nil; user.confirmation_token = "moi"; user.confirmation_sent_at = Time.parse("1970-01-01T00:33:20Z"); user.save!; user.updated_at = Time.parse("1970-01-01T00:16:40Z"); user.save!
SocialAccount.create!({provider_name: "twitter", omniauth_obj: {"uid"=>"some_twitter_uid", "provider"=>"twitter", "credentials"=>{"token"=>"token", "secret"=>"secret"}, "info"=>{"name"=>"Some Twitter Name"}}, created_at: Time.parse("1970-01-01T00:50:00Z"), updated_at: Time.parse("1970-01-01T01:06:40Z"), user: User.find("johndoe1"), })
Pavlov.interactor(:"facts/create", {fact_id: "1", displaystring: "Fact 1", site_title: "Fact title 1", url: "http://example.org/1.html", pavlov_options: {time: Time.parse("1970-01-01T01:23:20Z"), send_mails: false, }, })
